node.title: Managing Theological Conflict in the Local Church
node.description: Many churches in Michigan, and North America, are being faced with major theological controversy in the form of anti-Godhead, Branch Davidian and Shepherd’s Rod groups, etc. When churches face these conflicts, local church leaders are often at a loss as to how to help the church work through these issues and maintain unity. This class will address the steps leaders should take to protect the church and help the wandering.
